segments.text: This is Dunlin . Is this Mrs Smith speaking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just want to call and say thank you for letting me interview yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I also want to know what the status is of the position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , we haven't made the decision at all . But we should be making the decision by the end of this week . And we'll get in touch with you once we make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any questions we didn't cover in the interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , I am looking forward to hearing from you . Bye-bye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for the calling . Bye-bye .
segments.speaker: S2
